scripts.build: pnpm exec esbuild src/api.ts --bundle --platform=node --target=node18 --external:puppeteer-core --external:@sparticuz/chromium --external:winston --outfile=dist/api.js && pnpm exec esbuild src/worker.ts --bundle --platform=node --target=node18 --external:puppeteer-core --external:@sparticuz/chromium --external:winston --outfile=dist/worker.js
